definition: a cocktail made up of several kinds of rum with fruit juice and usually apricot liqueur
details:
noun
- a cocktail made up of several kinds of rum with fruit juice and usually apricot liqueur
= example: a cocktail made up of several kinds of rum with fruit juice and usually apricot liqueur
= synonyms:
- someone who acts or responds in a mechanical or apathetic way
= example: someone who acts or responds in a mechanical or apathetic way
= synonyms: automaton
- a dead body that has been brought back to life by a supernatural force
= example: a dead body that has been brought back to life by a supernatural force
= synonyms: , living dead
- a god of voodoo cults of African origin, worshipped especially in the West Indies
= example: a god of voodoo cults of African origin, worshipped especially in the West Indies
= synonyms: , snake god
- in voodooism, a spirit or supernatural force that reanimates a dead body
= example: in voodooism, a spirit or supernatural force that reanimates a dead body
